Header: 14 VIR Troops Assist Webamaalai Church Feast
Content: Ahead of the Church feast at Webamaalai Church in the Mullivaikkal (West) Grama Niladhari Division, 14 Vijayabhahu Infantry Regiment (VIR) troops under command to the 681 Brigade of the 68 Division cleaned the area and afterwards provided all possible assistance during (25-26 August) for conduct of the annual feast . Troops provided assistance to the pilgrims by erecting tents, raising colourful flags and providing drinking water and refreshments. The Commanding Officer 14 VIR under directions and supervision of the Commander 681 Brigade assisted the feast in numerous ways.
